name: v3.26.0 Release
body: * Support customize Content-Type when uploading multipart.

name: v3.25.0 Release
body: * Support flexible dump.

name: v3.24.1 Release
body: * Still return body when Response.ToBytes() got an error.

name: v3.24.0 Release
body: * Support [Parallel Download](https://req.cool/docs/tutorial/download/#parallel-download).

name: v3.23.0 Release
body:
* Support AddQueryParams (#164)
* Record original request in http3 (#165)

name: v3.22.1 Release
body: * Optimize debug log level when cannot determine the unmarshal function

name: v3.22.0 Release
body: * Support change the client of request dynamically (examples: [Automatically Change IP When Request Fails](https://req.cool/docs/examples/easily-write-crawlers-with-req/))

name: v3.21.1 Release
body: * Add EnableForceMultipart/DisableForceMultipart for Request.

name: v3.21.0 Release
body:
* Not use chunked encoding by default when uploading (#160)
* Support `EnableForceChunkedEncoding` and `DisableForceChunkedEncoding` on Request.

name: v3.20.1 Release
body: * Fix data race (#159)

name: v3.20.0 Release
body: * Support h2c.

name: v3.19.2 Release
body:
* Fix concurrent map in Client.Clone() when high concurrency (#157).
* Fix no Host in URL when SetScheme invoked.

name: v3.19.1 Release
body: *  Support http3 in go1.19

name: v3.19.0 Release
body:
* Add ClearCookies for Client.
* Fix autodecode when html page is small.

name: v3.18.0 Release
body: * Add EnableDumpEachRequestXXX methods (syntax sugar) for Client.

name: v3.17.7 Release
body: * Enable allow GET with body by default, discard body if disabled(#153)

name: v3.17.6 Release
body: * Restore Response.Body when AutoReadResponse is enabled(#152).

name: v3.17.5 Release
body:
* Update example.
* Unexpose Client's RoundTrip.

name: v3.17.4 Release
body: * Use `http.ErrUseLastResponse` to prevent return error in NoRedirectPolicy.

name: v3.17.3 Release
body:
* Add `HeaderToString()` for req and resp.
* Make sure the `resp.Err` set in the ResponseMiddleware is propagated to the caller.
* Update examples.

name: v3.17.2 Release
body:
* Request.Do() accepts 0 or 1 context.
* Support 0 or 1 url in Client's Get, Post and etc.
* Support Request.SetQueryParamsAnyType.

name: v3.17.1 Release
body: * Support SetFormDataAnyType(#148)

name: v3.17.0 Release
body:
* Support middleware in Client(#138).
* Expose Body and GetBody in Request.

name: v3.16.0 Release
body:
* Support pointer of pointer in resp.Unmarshal and resp.Into
* Support middleware in Transport(#138)

name: v3.15.0 Release
body:
* Support nil pointer and pointer of pointer in SetResult and SetError(#139)
* Support Do API style(#137)
* SetBody support basic types

name: v3.14.4 Release
body: * Support response middleware executed even error is not nil (#140)

name: v3.14.3 Release
body:
* Merge commit from upstream `net/http` and `quic-go`.
* Support go1.19.

name: v3.14.2 Release
body: * Ignore empty proxy url in SetProxyURL (#145)

name: v3.14.1 Release
body: Ajust log level to debug when cannot determine the unmarshal function(#133)

name: v3.14.0 Release
body:
* [Support HTTP3](https://req.cool/blog/http3-is-now-officially-supported/).
* Support chainable methods for Transport.
* Expose Client.GetTransport().
* Cancel set header in DevMode (#134).
* Add Client.GetLogger() to expose internal logger (#132).
* Refactor the code structure to make it easier to extend.

name: v3.13.2 Release
body: * Fix potential nil pointer issue when retrying with request (@88250 #131 )

name: v3.13.1 Release
body:
* Run user-defined request middleware after internal middleware. Make it possible to read generated info in request middleware, e.g. record req.URL.Path in request middleware.
* Fix typos and update readme.

name: v3.13.0 Release
body:
* Wrap more methods for Response.
* Fix typo.

name: v3.12.0 Release
body:
* Optimize SetError and SetResult.
* Client support SetCommonError.

name: v3.11.5 Release
body: * Improve response unmarshal.

name: v3.11.4 Release
body: * Expose method of Request

name: v3.11.3 Release
body:
* Improve debug log: show http version of requests.
* Let EnableForceHTTP1 also take effect when called when there is already an http2 connection.

name: v3.11.2 Release
body: * Avoid panic when invoke Response if error happened.

name: v3.11.1 Release
body: * Merge commits from upstream(net/http and x/net/http2)

name: v3.11.0 Release
body:
* Support SetHeaderNonCanonical and SetHeadersNonCanonical (#112).
* Support SetCommonHeaderNonCanonical and SetCommonHeadersNonCanonical.

name: v3.10.1 Release
body:
* Default unmarshal to json if Content-Type is not sure(#107)
* Avoid concurrent map iteration and map write(#111)

name: v3.10.0 Release
body:
* Support UploadCallback (#104)
* Support DownloadCallback

name: v3.9.6 Release
body: * Support AlwaysCopyHeaderRedirectPolicy (#103)

name: v3.9.5 Release
body: * support js && wasm

name: v3.9.4 Release
body: * update go.mod: require go1.15

name: v3.9.3 Release
body:
* Refactor a lot of tests.
* Reuse dump.Output if missing in Client.SetCommonDumpOptions.
* SetFile support retry.

name: v3.9.2 Release
body:
* Support update request in retry hook (#98)
* Refactor tests.

name: v3.9.1 Release
body: * Fix miss executing ResponseMiddlewares (#97)

name: v3.9.0 Release
body:
* Support retry (see [retry doc](https://github.com/imroc/req#Retry)).
* Support unix socket (see [unix socket doc](https://github.com/imroc/req#Unix)).

name: v3.8.2 Release
body:
* Fix typo (#95).
* Set ContentLength and guess ContentType if body is in-memory []byte.
* Use variadic parameter in SetFileUpload.
* Improve doc: Quick API Reference.

name: v3.8.1 Release
body: * Try sniff and auto-decode when Content-Type is malformed.

name: v3.8.0 Release
body: * Expose `http.Client`, so req can work with gock or httpmock (#93)
